description:
The APE is group of scientists and politicians who govern all of known humanity. All civilian and military organizations report to them or someone under them, with the exception of the special forces pilots, also known as the "Nines," who report directly to APE. They worked with http://anidb.net/ch93262 [Dr. Franxx] in the creation of the FRANXX program.
APE is ruled by a http://anidb.net/ch93324 [Chairman], who is known as "Papa" by Children and adults alike and worshiped as a god. Members of APE wear elegant white robes and sport unique mechanical masks.
name: APE
